name: darkcase: the basement
description:
This is a horror game where you play as a ghosthunter investigating paranormal darkcases. This time you got hired by an old couple to investigate their new house.

A little girl was murdered in that house many years ago, some locals around the area say the place is haunted. The new owners had seen a girl roaming around the house, especially in the basement.

You need to stay there for one night and survive with your equipment and cameras to clean the house from any ghost or unwanted spirits.
